channel.title: Lego Mindstorm
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Well, I bought Lego Mindstorm when I was in England and I wanna ask what do you think about it? Is it for lil kids or do you think its fun? :P Did this in 10 minutes: [URL=http://img30.imageshack.us/i/dsc00045saj.jpg/][IMG]http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/8342/dsc00045saj.jpg[/img][/URL]

item.title: Lego Mindstorm
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:3, topic:296891”][quote author=cocoa link=topic=392913.msg2924871#msg2924871 date=1250958635]
You know they have a competition for those. It’s called First Lego League. You should see if you school has a team for it. My school did for middle school. You have objectives and things and it’s really fun in my opinion.

OFFTOPIC:Your robot’s body is sideways.
[/quote]

Omg, i once went to that, the big competition thingy, Lego Robotics, our team got owned though. :|[/quote]
My team did really bad too lol ^^

Read full topic
